mapper.select: select * from user where login_name=#{loginName} and password=#{password} and user_status=1
select * from user where login_name=#{loginName} and email=#{email} and user_status=1
mapper.sql: ID, LOGIN_NAME, USERNAME, PASSWORD, ROLE_ID, USER_STATUS, EMAIL, QQ, COMPANY_ID, MANAGE_LEVEL, PHONE, CREATETIME, LEADER, REMARK
mapper.insert: insert into user (ID, LOGIN_NAME, USERNAME, PASSWORD, ROLE_ID, USER_STATUS, EMAIL, QQ, COMPANY_ID, MANAGE_LEVEL, PHONE, CREATETIME, LEADER, REMARK) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{manageLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{leader,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

ID,
LOGIN_NAME,
USERNAME,
PASSWORD,
ROLE_ID,
USER_STATUS,
EMAIL,
QQ,
COMPANY_ID,
MANAGE_LEVEL,
PHONE,
CREATETIME,

REMARK,

mapper.update:
update user
LOGIN_NAME = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USERNAME = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ROLE_ID = #{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
USER_STATUS = #{userStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QQ = #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MANAGE_LEVEL = #{manageLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LEADER = #{leader,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update user set LOGIN_NAME = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USERNAME = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ROLE_ID = #{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, USER_STATUS = #{userStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QQ = #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MANAGE_LEVEL = #{manageLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LEADER = #{leader,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
